itemLabel: Alfred Wilson, Baron Wilson of Radcliffe
itemDescription: British politician and chief executive officer (1909-1983)

wikipedia_page.main: Alfred Wilson, Baron Wilson of Radcliffe (10 June 1909 – 25 January 1983) was a figure within the British co-operative movement and a Labour and Co-operative life peer.

response: *Alfred Wilson, Baron Wilson of Radcliffe (1909–1983), British Co-operative movement figure and life peer
